name: Cat Saber
description:
Controls:

  • Click and drag the mouse to swing your sword;
  • "R" to restart

The game was made for the "Mix and Game" game jam in under 48 hours.

The aim is to provide an experience similar to Beat Saber, but transtated to a 2D environment rather than a 3D one.

Music used:

Nihilore - Oblivious - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rjWb_WwY2cA
